data.title: Data Science AI&I Intern (PHD level)
data.meta_description: Learn more about applying for Data Science AI&I Intern (PHD level) - Remote at Mayo Clinic
data.text:
Responsibilities

The Department of Artificial Intelligence and Informatics (AI&I) is a research department that supports Mayo Clinicâ€™s AI and Informatics strategies. AI&I includes clinical and research faculty, as well as the operational staff who engage in the use of informatics and digital technology to improve human health. The Department promotes collaborative research for advancing the methods, applications, and infrastructure in digital medicine with the emphasis on the synergy of people, processes, and technology, representing a multidisciplinary unification based on biomedical, computational, and social sciences.

The ideal internship candidate will utilize artificial intelligence, informatics, and programming skills in data management and analysis. Will include collaboration on data collection methods, writing, and archival, as well as the application of appropriate statistical methods for the analysis under the direction of the artificial intelligence and informatics consultants.

Qualifications

Working towards a PhD in data science, computer science, mathematics/statistics, informatics, computer engineering, or related field. Previous work experience or course work in artificial intelligence, machine learning or data science and use of software packages for data management and statistical analysis is preferred. Proven written and oral communication skill are essential. Ability to think logically and systematically analyze and evaluate alternate solutions in problem solving required.

Previous experience in programming languages such as Python, R, Java, C++ or others also preferred. Experience or familiarity with Linux/UNIX operating systems preferred. Proven competency to work independently preferred.

Exemption Status

Nonexempt

Compensation Detail

This position has a predetermined rate of $27.76 per hour.

Benefits Eligible

No

Schedule

Part Time

Hours/Pay Period

30

Schedule Details

This is a temporary appointment from mid-September to end of December 2024. M-F; 15-20 hours a week, but can vary.

Weekend Schedule

N/A

International Assignment

No

Site Description

Recruiter

Stephanie Baird
